comments.comment: Pewds showing such composure in the face of such an intruder is truly impressive
Felix has achieved a peace we all crave and I'm so happy for him
Japanese content by Felix is literally the definition of Happily ever after. So happy for Felix and Marzia! They totally deserve it! What a pleasure to watch their happy moments in these vlogs!

Felix has officially made it. Years of consistently making content, and now he can finally enjoy the fruits without any expectations or demands. It's so satisfying to watch someone realize their dreams.
The fact that Maya has been through all of Pewds' stages in his career is so precious as well
i absolutely adore the fact that we’re just watching his retirement now. i’m all for it, it is so relaxing seeing the man i’ve followed since 2011 finally smile again and find peace.
pewds living his best life man.
You can tell how much felix loves marzia he always has her in the shot
as long as pewdiepie still do collab with felix, your house is safe from intruders
I can really feel Felix and Marzia being the happiest they've ever been just chilling and having fun.
The smile he gave Marzia when she candidly walked in on him working out was so wholesome and sweet
Watching Pewds and Marzia being happy together makes me nostalgic of a feeling ive never experienced

It’s really wholesome to just watch Felix living his best life now…

After 12 years straight of hard work he really deserves this kind of happiness.

The internet really needs this sort of wholesome positive content right now. Every video makes me feel like I’m on vacation. Pewds is awesome at not making you feel like he’s trying to flex on you or make you feel inadequate. Great stuff. Except for the spider..

His life is like watching the end credits to a movie. I’m very happy for you Felix. In my darkest moments in life you have always brought a smile on my face. I hope I can find the same level of peace as you have.

And this is why I like living up north!
(Far less spiders north of Tokyo hehe)
Bro, I'm literally crying, I haven't watched his videos in a long time but seeing felix happy and living his dream is truly heartwarming, so happy for him
I wasn't expecting this to be so wholesome. It's like watching a happy ending with credits after a long road to get there. I too feel happy for them.
The positive comments that basically make up all of Felix’s videos must make him so happy. Especially since they weren’t always so nice to him.

I am so happy that this is what this channel has evolved to. It's the big pay off to their work and the support they have been given all these years.

It's like the happy "How are they now" after the credits of an last episode.

This is the outcome of hard work and the appreciation given from others.
You can feel how happy Felix and Marzia are. They are truly enjoying their life in Japan. And I’m glad I’m getting to see Japan vicariously through them
when you finally hit the peak of your life after all the hard work and circumstances you've overcome. it's tranquil

Pewdiepie: "Our house was attacked"

Everyone in Comment section: "This man never fails to make us Happy"

Really feels like the end of an era. One that makes me really glad Pewds and Marzia are somewhere they absolutely love. Something different. Something that is undoubtedly one of the best possible outcome of a journey one could ever hope for.

We love you Felix, and also dont forget to  tell Marzia we love her too. The people that have been with you 2 since the beginning of youtube, will always and forever feel this way. We are surely happy you're living your best life! Well deserved.
I love these vids, they are so peaceful and fun. It’s like looking old memories on my phone kinda vibes

It feels like watching a documentary on a retired YouTube legend
Honestly if he considers this to be his retirement I fully embrace it
Because at least we still get some videos updating us on how he is, and really we can't really ask more from him when he's already given so much

Man, this video just gave me the feels. I never though one could feel such happines for someone you don’t even know. After being a bro since 2011 and seeing all the phases this channel has gone through, I think you deserve it the most.
I literally cannot express how happy it makes me seeing pewds living his happy life in japan w his little family.
They both have personalities that are too cute by half-and I love it. They are kind people who walk the earth lightly.
I haven't seen one of Pewd's videos in years, I'm so glad to see him living the dream after all the hard work he put out.

Pewdiepie: "Our house was attacked"

Everyone in comment section: "This man never fails to make us happy"
This was so pure . The enjoyment of life he shares with his wife is beautiful . So happy for them
I have never heard Pewds sound so genuinely terrified in all these years of videos and scary games as I have in the moments before he sucked up the spider

I am seriously loving seeing Marcia in your vlogs again, I missed her when she stopped doing her own channel. I am loving how your lives have developed over the years and seeing you guys happy makes me happy
I’m struggling after my dreams in life but I grew up watching pewdiepie. Just seeing him and Marzia live the dream always gives me hope

I absolutely love how their Chanel has become more Marzia-Felix style (marzia editing style with pretty music)- but with a Felix twist. Really missed having her videos around too so it’s nice to see both of them together exploring  keep up the great work guys- love the Japan blogs

House attacked by spider!! Hahaha! What hypnotizing place you went by the way with the water and all the trippy stuff..  I love how your singing so sillily with songs! You remember did a cover for it too !!
Seeing pewds and Marzia happy really puts a smile on my face. Especially since he’s been entertaining us for a decade. He deserves this hapiness.

The fact that Marzia walked in on Felix just casually working out to Nickleback is what got me. It makes me genuinely happy to see him just doing what he wants and doing what makes him happy. I hope to see more like this and it gives me goals to set my life towards lolz
So happy for this man. What a life he is living right now. After watching this guy for years and years now, I'm over the moon Felix is still uploading videos and sharing his life. What a guy.
I love how you could just pay a carpenter to make the table for you but you chose to do it your self for Marzia, so sweet

I'm glad he's finally got the life he wanted. So happy for him and Marzia.
We all love you Felix & Marzia.
It must so comforting for them to finally be somewhere they can live and walk around without being harassed, watching them grow old will be a treat

My dad was a US Navy officer and absolutely loved Japan and it's people. With shore leave he would take a cab as far out of the city as he could and began walking. Before dark someone would invite him to stay the night, or for days. He could practice the language and do chores to help out and explore the area. 
I sure do miss him.

These videos truly bring me joy. Having watched Pewds for nearly ten years, starting out thinking he was just for kids, then becoming a ride or die because of Fridays with PewDiePie, then staying strong through all the drama, and all the hate, and now I am rewarded by seeing a creator who I enjoy very much simply living his life in a way which he finds acceptable. 

There is so much striving in this world, for more, for better, for greatness, for power. Seeing someone whose greatest goals are contentment, introspection, and mindfulness of the world in which he finds himself is an inspiration and should be enjoyed by any person who find themselves too caught up in the speed and scariness of our day to day lives.
Idk why but these vlogs just seem so cool, it's literally just felix genuinely enjoying himself and exploring Japan.. it just feels so beautiful like the perfect end to a movie.
It's amazing how jacked he became, especially since coming to Japan. You can really tell he is in a really good place where he can focus on his passions.
i love these vlogs, it’s like getting to see what happens in the “happily ever after” that usually gets left out :’)

Imagine going back to your child self and telling them that in the future pewds would completely abandon video games and just make videos of him living his life and learning languages and we were all here for it

Pewds and Marzia literally on a permanent vacation with unlimited funds to do anything they like. Just be happy and healthy. Love these vlogs as they make me feel like not everything in the world is terrible.

It feels weird realizing I've been watching Felix for 12 years I've been watching him since I was  8 years old.. and now I'm 20.. how time flies.. really love the japan vlogs/blogs really fun and enjoyable! Please keep them coming! :D
Genuinely impressed with Felix's furniture building skills. That table looked professionally made.

This is what i have been wainting for. This content. This vibe. This type of videos. It's pure, it's Felix having the liberty of doing what he wants, beeing who he wants to be. Congrats my man. Have a happy life.
That title got me worried for a hot second. Glad to see you're still in good shape, Felix!
I'm Japanese, and I laughed out loud at the sight of Felix struggling with the spider.
I love seeing the Japan videos
My same relationship with spiders!! Also needed that laugh, thanks Pewd!
He has worked really hard over the past few years. He deserves all the happiness.
You know after everything that has happened, the adpocalypse, the race to stay #1, and Covid, it's nice to see that he's still giving it all, even if he's no longer #1, he's still our #1 youtuber.

This video feels like a warm hug on a cold day. Congrats Pewds and Marzia, yall deserve it :') 
Love, all your fans
14:34 I always forget how awesome Felix’s tattoos look
I’m so glad Felix is living his best life now he deserves it after all the amazing content he’s made for us over the years
Japan pewds is so happy, so glad to see him like this and seeing him put out the best content possible

This is super nostalgic, it almost gave me that feeling of finally getting to the next stage of your life. Like the winding down of a journey and a start of a new one! Love where y'all are at in life, stay chilling!
Marzia you’re such a talented editor thank you so much for the work you put into these

It's been about a month since I've seen a PewDiePie video but this has literally been the best vibes in a video I've seen in a long long time, I had moments where I had tears of joy for marxia and Felix and just being able to experience these moments with you wonderful people
This is the pewdiepie content I'm genuinely loving, every upload feels personal and well made. Thank you for sharing your wonderful life at japan

Been watching pewds since I was 15, now I'm almost 25. From Amnesia to pewds having his dream come true by moving to Japan. Feeling so glad to see how happy you and Marzia are. :) Loving every single Japan video so far
i can’t believe how professional that tv stand is. the whole room looks unbelievable!
I love how relaxed he is now with his videos, back in 2015 shit was WILD
Latest vids really do feel like an “epilogue”— it’s great seeing you so happy Pewds!
Really just like seeing their little family together and happy. The dogs, Pewds and Marzia all in Japan. Makes me tear up a little

As someone who’s been there from the start it’s really enticing to see the where pewds led him. You can feel the hard work and passion through all the eras. True legends comes from being you, growing and adapting through your life and its hardships but never forgetting where you came from and staying true to yourself.
These always make me cry a little but not out of sadness. So happy for Pewds and Marzia after following them for so long
I love seeing pewds and marzia having fun like this and living their best life, makes me hopeful and happy for my own future too. Stay on top Pewds, we all love you

makes me so fucking happy seeing pewdiepie finally reap the rewards of years of grind on youtube. Settled down in a beautiful country, with a wife, and two kids. You earned it, homie, live the rest of your life happy as fuck you deserve it for all the happiness you've put out in your years on this platform.
i love their marriage, they're such a perfect match. Blessings felix and marzia !!

This vlog made me laugh out loud SO many times, especially the spider attack (I'd be scared too though, they're huge!), Marzia playing with Edgar, Felix listening to Nickelback and singing, Maya being "long" and more haha, thank you for this! Also amazing editing and music choices Mertz <3

I remember being in highschool almost a decade ago constantly refreshing my YouTube after school waiting for the next pewds video. It’s truly amazing how far he’s come and I’m so happy to have experienced it. Although I am no longer the most frequent and haven’t been for a while, everytime I check in it feels like I never left. Good luck to you both in Japan!

As others have said, I discovered you on your amnesia let’s play…I’ve grown right along with you and I’m so happy to see that your happy with Marzia living your best life. brofist forever pewds, thanks for bringing a smile to my face over the years, you’ve gotten me through some tough times and I am forever grateful. Love ya man!

pewdiepie's atmosphere perfectly matches that of Japan.
pewdiepieさんの雰囲気と日本の雰囲気が完璧にマッチしてる！！

I really LOVE these vlog videos... I feel like as I have grown up over the years, so has the channel and it's evolved into this calm, honest and beautiful content that I really need and appreciate at this point in my life. 

I don't think there are any other videos I look more forward to more than these vlogs. They're such a joy to view and it's so great to see the glimpses of Felix and Marzia just enjoying life and being who they are.
how beautiful, it truly is. pewds has a happily ever after. these vlogs are so wholesome. him and his wife, living the dream, I wish them nothing but the best.

I lived in Japan for half a year and I found the love of my life there. The way Marzia and Felix present these vlogs feels so similar to how I used to feel. Thanks to these beautifully captured and created snipits of your lives, I can feel the same joy I used to feel. I can't wait to go back!
Marzia playing with Edgar is the sweetest,, always my fav part of these videos
It’s honestly comforting to see this side of pewds. It’s warm and chilling

I love these new vlogs and "retired" life for pewds. I'll always love the pewdiepie of old but I love how chill this is and its like watching an old friend who's finally able to relax after working so hard for so long.

Love the slow turn your channel has taken, and how your channel maturing fits with your audience having grown up with you and being interested in different things nowadays. I know it sounds like the base for parasocial relationships, but somewhere deep down it does feel like growing up with an old friend.

Wish you all the happiness you deserve in Japan Felix, you're a great entertainer.
No matter what age, size or gender you are, if you are scared of spiders you will scream and cry like a terrified baby. I feel you, Felix. I feel you.

Literally on the verge of tears for some odd reason. Grew up with these two and now they’re living an absolute dream. So happy for you two. Keep these vlogs coming because they are the highlight of my week/weeks. Smiling the whole way through.
10 years I've been watching you Felix, you teach me how to speak and understand English, you made my days happy, I'm glad to see that you and Marzia are happy and in peace
To watch Felix and Marzia truly enioy their lives in Japan is so heartwarming to see, and it's so nice to have them share it with us :)
He's living the dream. I'm so happy for him it's well deserved!

Personally, ever since I stopped caring as much about spiders in my house, I've had bacisally no problems with any other insects. It's like I've hired mercenaries to guard my home.

Although, there was one really strange time where a spider crawled directly above me on the ceiling. After which, it decided to slowly lower himself down with webs like it was auditioning for Mission Impossible.

Idk what it wanted. It was clearly aiming for me for some reason. Maybe it wanted to be my friend. Maybe not. We'll never know cuz it's dead now.
Seeing him go from the "trying too hard" Amnesia days to them both just living a dream life is so amazing; glad to see how happy they are~
From Amnesia and unity horror to giant spiders in Japan. Truly went a long way.
I actually felt like crying idk why, just the wholesomeness of the video really hit home in the heart, if genuinely happy for Feliz and Marzia.

For some reason this video gave me a sense of appreciation for being here in the moment. It's crazy to think one day we will all be 80 years old reminiscing about these short moments and what we did with our time. We often look back on our childhood without realizing  were also in another golden moment of our life, with so much time to develop and experience our time here while it lasts. There's just something sad about knowing how un permanent it all really is, in even just a short 200 years every single persons life, even the most wildly successful, will meet the same fate because time never stops. It's just a reminder that all this really come down to is what you're feeling and doing now, not tomorrow or yesterday, just try to find that space in your life that's going to make it so when you're 80 remisicing, you're going to tell yourself that if you started from the beginning again you will have spent your extremely precious time the same exact way
Pewds used to be my afternoon hype, now he’s my morning relaxation.
Felix has been entertaining us for almost decade so seeing him right now enjoying his life is satisfying.
I love these videos.. they’re so calming. I really enjoy this type of content. Thanks Pewdiepie your videos always make me feel better🫶

God. I remember being in middle school watching all his Slender, Happy Wheels, and all his other videos. 

Now I'm 23, working full time, living with my boyfriend with our apartment. It feels so oddly nostalgic to watch this video now that I'm grown up. It makes me feel so many emotions that I can't describe. I'm so happy for Felix and Marzia.
I'm glad they're living their best life ️

i teared up twice while watching this because of how wholesome this is. i can honestly feel the happiness that radiates off this video, seeing you guys have so much fun and being so happy is so great. so deserved. i love these videos, thank you for sharing your adventures (:
0:01 "Our has was attacked..." Starts out with normal vlog intro
Having watched pewds since he first started making videos, it feels like I’ve been along for all the ups and downs. Seeing his dreams materialise and him making it in life, makes me so happy.

I've been watching you since 2012... you were my childhood and now I'm 23 years old. You grew up. I grew up. We're both starting a new life in a new place. Thank you for always being here. Thank you for your comedy. Thank you for my childhood. I wish you and Marzia the best and most wholesome life forever and ever. I love you both.  Thank you.

Damn seeing you come all this way from back when I discovered you because of your Amnesia Lets Play (which to me seems like it was just last year) to seeing you genuinely happy, matured and settled is such a happy moment. Felix, thanks for literally growing up beside me, I wish you all the best in life. Brofist forever.

Man Japan looks AMAZING! You and Marzia are living the dream and deserve it so much  So much peace and love seen in just these vlogs. Thank you for giving us a glimpse into your incredible new life in Japan 🇯🇵️
I’m loving this new Pewdiepie content. Every video feels so personal and well made. Thank you for sharing your life in Japan with us
Damn I just realized I've been watching Pewds for 10 years. It felt like it was just yesterday. Thank you for everything Pewds! You're the best youtuber fr fr
normally i'd never watch a video like this, but you can really feel the happiness coming from felix and marzia. you can tell theyre really enjoying their lives in japan ️
Honestly watching this made me feel so zen - it’s like you guys are on one big date all the time and it’s so cute

Looks like you got Huntsman spiders in your house. As long as they're just male spiders, I don't think you have to worry so much. Huntsmen are actually really good spiders to have in your house, because they eat all the other bugs, and are generally very docile and chill. You can even hold one in your hand if you're game enough.
This is literally the sweetest most wholesome thing in the world! I'm so proud of Felix and Marzia and the dreams they've achieved. They deserve to be happy :D
Seeing both pewds and marzia being scared of a spider just made my day love the vlog so far and I can’t wait to see even more!
Both of them freaking out over that spider is couple goals
Felix has truly reached the "endgame" in life. Something that will take most of our lives to achieve if not at all. Honestly I would be totally fine if these vlogs are mostly what he ever posts.

I love how even though you two live mostly solitary lives, you still turned your youtube channel into something like this, sharing your life. I love watching this content from time to time, even as I may not watch most of what you post; I still like to check in every once in a while.
